title: Vice Chancellor's Award for Best Graduating Student
description: Received the Vice Chancellor's Award as the Best Graduating Computer Engineering Student from the Federal University of Technology, Akure, Nigeria, having been on the Dean's List for nine semesters.

title: Lead Machine Learning Researcher
description: Led a team at Federal University of Technology, Akure (July 2023 – March 2024) to develop a Student Grade Prediction Model, achieving 92% accuracy in forecasting WASSCE performance, published in a peer-reviewed journal.

title: Outstanding ML Engineer Intern
description: Earned the Outstanding Intern Award at Chronicles Software Development Company (January 2023 – June 2023) for building an NLP-powered Chatbot Tutor, adopted by 500+ students for personalized learning.

title: Community Impact Leader
description: Served as CDS President for ICT, NYSC, Ojodu LG (October 2024 – January 2025), implementing digital literacy programs that trained 200+ community members in software development and AI basics.

title: Best Research Assistant and Student Researcher
description: Received recognition as the Best Research Assistant and Student Researcher at the Machine Learning Research Lab, Federal University of Technology, Akure, for outstanding contributions to machine learning research.

title: Machine Learning Educator
description: Organized and delivered free weekend workshops on Machine Learning and Neural Networks in Lagos (December 2023), impacting 100+ students and professionals, with 90% reporting improved understanding.
